metadata.title: DPM Dar chairs meeting to review Pak-Iran bilateral economic ties

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, June 04 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister / Foreign Minister, Senator Mohammad Ishaq Wednesday chaired an interdepartmental meeting to review Pakistan-Iran bilateral economic relations. The meeting focused on exploring avenues to enhance cooperation, particularly in economic and trade sectors, and reaffirmed the importance of fostering ties based on mutual respect, shared interests, and regional stability, Foreign Office Spokesperson said in a press release.
